raw_body:
FERNANDO – JULIET,​ Dearly beloved wife of late Bennet Francis Fernando,​ loving mother of Chamindrani,​ Chanaka (Retd. Wing Commander,​ SLAF),​ Chumley (Australia) and Chaudrie,​ precious sister of Anna (late),​ Robert (late),​ Joseph (late) and Raymond,​ dearest mother-in-law of Dinesh,​ Priyani,​ Kishani and Manoj,​ adored grandmother of Dineshini,​ Roshini,​ Shalinda,​ Tharindu,​ Dhanushka,​ Shahiru,​ Shavinda,​ Sheruni and Kayshinie and much loved great-grandmother of Neraaya,​ Nevaan,​ Dilain,​ Ruwain,​ Reyaan,​ Reyden and Matthew,​ passed away peacefully. Remains will lie at No. 10,​ Hotel Road,​ Mount Lavinia from 10.00 a.m. 19th January. Cortege leaves residence for St. Anthony’s Church,​ Mt. Lavinia by 3.30 p.m. and then for burial at Mount Lavinia Cemetery at 4.15 p.m. on Saturday,​ 20th of January,​ 2024.
004549
